heading: All Maxroll Spiritborn Guides are Live!
content: Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred are (almost) here and the released our massive Season 6 Compendium yesterday. As promised, all Build Guides are released, and most importantly for those eager to play with the new Vessel of Hatred class: All of our Spiritborn Guides are now live! This is just the beginning as we will keep updating content as the expansion and the new Spiritborn class reveal their secrets! Don't know what playstyle you're looking for? See the lists below to choose your class and embark on an adventure. They are great in helping assist you along the way. We'll be testing these builds and making adjustments where required, along with creating new builds throughout the Season! Check out our new class-specific Tier Lists and especially Spiritborn ones! If your eyes are looking towards another class, if you want to play one of those new cool Vessel of Hatred skills, don't worry, the pumped out new Build Guides for every Diablo 4 class! Here is a list of the new Build Guides you should look at: With the new season, a lot of excitement is waiting for us. Many of our Diablo Team members will be streaming at the season's start. Below you will find links to their stream, so you can watch and learn along with them. If you're looking for something to do while refreshing to see if the server is up, check out our We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Contributions by:
